### Conferences, Courses and Working Groups

 * March 2017 - Course: Matrix Approaches Health Demography (2 weeks), taught by Hal Caswell at the Max Planck Institute for Demographic Research. Introducing methods based on Markov chains, Markov chains with rewards, multistate matrix models, and matrix calculus.
 * January 2017 - Course: Foundations for Effective Scientific Writing (1 week).
 * December 2016 - Conference: British Ecological Society Annual Meeting in Liverpool. Presented a poster about the COMPADRE and COMADRE matrix databases.

 * Summer 2016 - Working group: International Demographic Working Group (1 week), hosted at the University of Exeter.
